title: Playing Chrome media while in lockscreen mode - how do I stop it from timing out?
content:
I'm listening to a video via Chrome on my phone. I can lock the phone and then restart the media audio. However, it times out and shuts off after about 10 min. Of interest I can hit play again from the lockscreen but it doesn't work. I have to unlock the screen, start the video, lock the screen again, and then restart it from the lock screen.

I find this process really disruptive to my listening experience. Are there any settings that prevent this time out from occurring?

TIA
